title: RSI Mean Reversion Strategy: - Buy when RSI(14)

steps.title: RSI Mean Reversion Strategy: - Buy when RSI(14)
steps.notes:
Original: RSI Mean Reversion Strategy:
        - Buy when RSI(14) drops below 30 (oversold)
        - Sell when RSI(14) rises above 70 (overbought)
        - Stop loss at 3% below entry
        - Position size: 2% of account per trade
        - Trade on 1-hour timeframe

sources.author: api_user
